com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.input

Class Keyboard

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.input.Keyboard

  • public class Keyboard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class allows for handling of keys in a game oriented way.
    Author:
    Maxstupo
